00049 Vector3D::Vector3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00050 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00051 {
00052 }
00053 
00054 Vector3D::Vector3D( const NormalVector& norm )
00055 : x(norm.x), y(norm.y), z(norm.z)
00056 {
00057 }
00058 
00059 Vector3D::Vector3D( const Point3D& point )
00060 : x(point.x), y(point.y), z(point.z)
00061 {
00062 }
00063 Vector3D::Vector3D( const SbVec3f& vec )
00064 : x(vec[0]), y(vec[1]), z(vec[2])
00065 {
00066 }

00074 SbVec3f Vector3D::ToSbVec3f()
00075 {
00076         return SbVec3f(float(x),float(y),float(z));
00077 }

00079 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00080 {
00081     x += vector.x;
00082     y += vector.y;
00083     z += vector.z;
00084     return *this;
00085 }
00086 
00087 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00088 {
00089     x -= vector.x;
00090     y -= vector.y;
00091     z -= vector.z;
00092     return *this;
00093 }
00094 
00095 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00096 {
00097     x *= scalar;
00098     y *= scalar;
00099     z *= scalar;
00100     return *this;
00101 }
00102 
00103 Vector3D Vector3D::operator*( double scalar ) const
00104 {
00105     return Vector3D( x * scalar, y * scalar, z * scalar );
00106 }
00107 
00108 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00109 {
00110     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00111     x *= inv;
00112     y *= inv;
00113     z *= inv;
00114     return *this;
00115 }
00116 
00117 Vector3D Vector3D::operator/( double scalar ) const
00118 {
00119     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00120     return Vector3D( x * inv, y * inv, z * inv );
00121 }
00122 
00123 Vector3D Vector3D::operator-() const
00124 {
00125     return Vector3D( -x, -y, -z );
00126 }
00127 
00128 bool Vector3D::operator==( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00129 {
00130         if( this == &vector ) return true;
00131     else return( ( fabs(x - vector.x) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00132                                  ( fabs(y - vector.y) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00133                                  ( fabs(z - vector.z) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00134 }
00135 
00136 bool Vector3D::operator!=( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00137 {
00138         return !( *this == vector );
00139 }
00140 
00141 double Vector3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00142 {
00143     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00144     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00145     return z;
00146 }
00147 
00148 double& Vector3D::operator[]( int i )
00149 {
00150     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00151     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00152     return z;
00153 }
00154 
00155 void Vector3D::zero()
00156 {
00157     x = 0.0;
00158     y = 0.0;
00159     z = 0.0;
00160 }
00161 
00162 double Vector3D::lengthSquared( ) const
00163 {
00164     return( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00165 }
00166 
00167 double Vector3D::length( ) const
00168 {
00169         return std::sqrt( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00170 }

00172 Vector3D operator+( Vector3D lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00173 {
00174         //lhs take by value to let the compile to make the copy
00175         return lhs += rhs;
00176 }
00177 
00178 Vector3D operator-( Vector3D lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00179 {
00180         //lhs take by value to let the compile to make the copy
00181         return lhs -= rhs;
00182 }
00183 
00184 Vector3D operator*( double scalar, const Vector3D& vector )
00185 {
00186     return Vector3D( scalar * vector.x, scalar * vector.y, scalar * vector.z );
00187 }

00189 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Vector3D& vector )
00190 {
00191     os << vector.x << ", " << vector.y << ", " << vector.z;
00192     return os;
00193 }

00195 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00196 {
00197     return vA.x*vB.x + vA.y*vB.y + vA.z*vB.z;
00198 }
00199 
00200 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00201 {
00202     return vA.x*nB.x + vA.y*nB.y + vA.z*nB.z;
00203 }
00204 
00205 double DotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00206 {
00207     return nA.x*vB.x + nA.y*vB.y + nA.z*vB.z;
00208 }
00209 
00210 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00211 {
00212     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, vB ) );
00213 }
00214 
00215 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00216 {
00217     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, nB ) );
00218 }
00219 
00220 double AbsDotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00221 {
00222     return fabs( DotProduct( nA, vB ) );
00223 }
00224 
00225 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00226 {
00227     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*vB.z ) - ( vA.z*vB.y ),
00228                      ( vA.z*vB.x ) - ( vA.x*vB.z ),
00229                      ( vA.x*vB.y ) - ( vA.y*vB.x ) );
00230 }
00231 
00232 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00233 {
00234     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*nB.z ) - ( vA.z*nB.y ),
00235                      ( vA.z*nB.x ) - ( vA.x*nB.z ),
00236                      ( vA.x*nB.y ) - ( vA.y*nB.x ) );
00237 }
00238 
00239 Vector3D CrossProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00240 {
00241     return Vector3D( ( nA.y*vB.z ) - ( nA.z*vB.y ),
00242                      ( nA.z*vB.x ) - ( nA.x*vB.z ),
00243                      ( nA.x*vB.y ) - ( nA.y*vB.x ) );
00244 }
00245 
00246 Vector3D Normalize( const Vector3D& vA )
00247 {
00248         if (vA.length() > 0.0f) return vA / vA.length();
00249         return vA;
00250 }
00251 
00252 bool SameHemisphere( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00253 {
00254         return ( vA.z * vB.z > 0.0 );
00255 }
